00009 eolBool eol_dialog_text_block_update(eolWindow *win,GList *updates)
00010 {
00011   GList *c;
00012   eolWindowCallback call = NULL;
00013   eolComponent *comp = NULL;
00014   if ((win == NULL)||(updates == NULL))return eolFalse;
00015   for (c = updates;c != NULL;c = c->next)
00016   {
00017     if (c->data == NULL)continue;
00018     comp = (eolComponent *)c->data;
00019     switch (comp->id)
00020     {
00021       case 2:
00022         if (win->callbacks != NULL)
00023         {
00024           call = win->callbacks[0];
00025           if (call != NULL)call(win->customData);
00026         }
00027         eol_window_free(&win);
00028         return eolTrue;
00029     }
00030   }
00031   return eolFalse;
00032 }

00034 void eol_dialog_text_block(eolLine title,
00035                            char   *text,
00036                            eolWord okText,
00037                            void    *data,
00038                            eolWindowCallback onOK)
00039 {
00040   eolRect trect;  /*title dimensions*/
00041   eolRect brect;
00042   eolUint ww,wh;  /*window dimensions*/
00043   eolUint bw,bh;  /*button dimensions*/
00044   eolFloat bx,by;
00045   eolUint sw,sh;  /*screen dimensions*/
00046   eolWindow *win = eol_window_new();
00047   eolComponent *comp = NULL;
00048   if (!win)
00049   {
00050     eol_logger_message(
00051       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00052       "eol_dialog:failed to make text block dialog.\n");
00053     return;
00054   }
00055   strncpy(win->name,"text_block",EOLLINELEN);
00056 
00057   eol_graphics_get_size(&sw, &sh);
00058   eol_button_get_stock_size(&bw, &bh);
00059   trect = eol_font_get_bounds(title,4);
00060   brect = eol_font_get_block_bounds(
00061     text,
00062     3,
00063     480,
00064     0
00065   );
00066 
00067   ww = MAX(trect.w + 10, brect.w + 8);
00068   wh = trect.h + brect.h + bh + 22;
00069 
00070   eol_rect_copy(&win->rect,eol_rect((sw/2) - (ww/2),(sh/2) - (wh/2),ww,wh));
00071   win->canHasFocus = eolTrue;
00072   win->drawGeneric = eolTrue;
00073   win->update = eol_dialog_text_block_update;
00074 
00075   by = eol_window_get_relative_position(2,win->rect.h);
00076   comp = eol_label_new(0,"text_title",eol_rectf(0.5,by,1,1),win->rect,eolTrue,
00077                        title,eolJustifyCenter,eolFalse,4,NULL,eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00078   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00079 
00080   
00081   bx = eol_window_get_relative_position(brect.w,win->rect.w);
00082   by = eol_window_get_relative_position(4 +trect.h,win->rect.h);
00083   comp = eol_label_new(1,"text_block",eol_rectf(0.5-(bx/2),by,1,1),win->rect,eolTrue,
00084                        text,eolJustifyLeft,eolTrue,3,NULL,eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00085   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00086 
00087   bx = eol_window_get_relative_position(win->rect.w - bw,win->rect.w);
00088   by = eol_window_get_relative_position(win->rect.h - bh,win->rect.h);
00089   comp = eol_button_stock_new(2,
00090                               "ok_button",
00091                               eol_rectf(bx,by,1,1),
00092                               win->rect,
00093                               "OK",
00094                               SDLK_RETURN,
00095                               0,
00096                               eolFalse);
00097   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00098 
00099   win->customData = data;
00100 
00101   eol_window_allocat_callbacks(win,1);
00102   if ((win->callbacks != NULL) && (win->callbackCount == 1))
00103   {
00104     win->callbacks[0] = onOK;
00105   }
00106 }

00108 eolBool eol_dialog_yes_no_update(eolWindow *win,GList *updates)
00109 {
00110   GList *c;
00111   eolWindowCallback call = NULL;
00112   eolComponent *comp = NULL;
00113   if ((win == NULL)||(updates == NULL))return eolFalse;
00114   for (c = updates;c != NULL;c = c->next)
00115   {
00116     if (c->data == NULL)continue;
00117     comp = (eolComponent *)c->data;
00118     switch (comp->id)
00119     {
00120       case 1:
00121         if (win->callbacks != NULL)
00122         {
00123           call = win->callbacks[0];
00124           if (call != NULL)call(win->customData);
00125         }
00126         eol_window_free(&win);
00127         return eolTrue;
00128       case 2:
00129         if (win->callbacks != NULL)
00130         {
00131           call = win->callbacks[1];
00132           if (call != NULL)call(win->customData);
00133         }
00134         eol_window_free(&win);
00135         return eolTrue;
00136     }
00137   }
00138   return eolFalse;
00139 }

00141 void eol_dialog_yes_no(eolLine question,
00142                        void * customData,
00143                        eolWindowCallback onYes,
00144                        eolWindowCallback onNo)
00145 {
00146   eolRect trect;  /*text dimensions*/
00147   eolUint ww,wh;  /*window dimensions*/
00148   eolUint bw,bh;  /*button dimensions*/
00149   eolUint sw,sh;  /*screen dimensions*/
00150   eolWindow *win = eol_window_new();
00151   eolComponent *comp = NULL;
00152   if (!win)
00153   {
00154     eol_logger_message(
00155       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00156       "eol_dialog:failed to make yes/no dialog.\n");
00157     return;
00158   }
00159   strncpy(win->name,"yesno",EOLLINELEN);
00160   eol_graphics_get_size(&sw, &sh);
00161   eol_button_get_stock_size(&bw, &bh);
00162   trect = eol_font_get_bounds(question,3);
00163   if (trect.w > ((bw*2) + 6))
00164   {
00165     ww = trect.w + 10;
00166   }
00167   else
00168   {
00169     ww = (bw*2) + 16;
00170   }
00171   wh = trect.h + bh + 16;
00172   eol_rect_copy(&win->rect,eol_rect((sw/2) - (ww/2),(sh/2) - (wh/2),ww,wh));
00173   win->canHasFocus = eolTrue;
00174   win->drawGeneric = eolTrue;
00175   win->update = eol_dialog_yes_no_update;
00176   comp = eol_label_new(0,"yes_title",eol_rectf(0.5,0.1,1,1),win->rect,eolTrue,
00177                        question,eolJustifyCenter,eolFalse,3,NULL,eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00178   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00179   comp = eol_button_stock_new(1,
00180                               "yes_button",
00181                               eol_rectf(0.25,0.65,1,1),
00182                               win->rect,
00183                               "YES",
00184                               SDLK_y,
00185                               0,
00186                               eolTrue);
00187   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00188   comp = eol_button_stock_new(2,
00189                               "no_button",
00190                               eol_rectf(0.75,0.65,1,1),
00191                               win->rect,
00192                               "NO",
00193                               SDLK_n,
00194                               0,
00195                               eolTrue);
00196   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00197   win->customData = customData;
00198   eol_window_allocat_callbacks(win,2);
00199   if ((win->callbacks != NULL) && (win->callbackCount == 2))
00200   {
00201     win->callbacks[0] = onYes;
00202     win->callbacks[1] = onNo;
00203   }
00204 }

00206 void eol_dialog_quit_yes(void *data)
00207 {
00208   exit(0);
00209 }
00210 
00211 void eol_dialog_quit_no(void *data)
00212 {
00213   _eol_dialog_quitting = eolFalse;
00214 }
00215 
00216 void eol_dialog_quit()
00217 {
00218   if (_eol_dialog_quitting)return;
00219   eol_dialog_yes_no("Exit the Program?",
00220                     NULL,
00221                     eol_dialog_quit_yes,
00222                     eol_dialog_quit_no);
00223   _eol_dialog_quitting = eolTrue;
00224 }
00225 
00226 /*text prompt*/
00227 eolBool eol_dialog_text_prompt_update(eolWindow *win,GList *updates)
00228 {
00229   GList *c;
00230   eolWindowCallback call = NULL;
00231   eolComponent *comp = NULL;
00232   if ((win == NULL)||(updates == NULL))return eolFalse;
00233   for (c = updates;c != NULL;c = c->next)
00234   {
00235     if (c->data == NULL)continue;
00236     comp = (eolComponent *)c->data;
00237     switch (comp->id)
00238     {
00239       case 1:
00240         eol_entry_assign_output(eol_window_get_component_by_id(win,3));
00241         if (win->callbacks != NULL)
00242         {
00243           call = win->callbacks[0];
00244           if (call != NULL)call(win->customData);
00245         }
00246         eol_window_free(&win);
00247         return eolTrue;
00248       case 2:
00249         if (win->callbacks != NULL)
00250         {
00251           call = win->callbacks[1];
00252           if (call != NULL)call(win->customData);
00253         }
00254         eol_window_free(&win);
00255         return eolTrue;
00256     }
00257   }
00258   return eolFalse;
00259 }
00260 
00261 eolWindow *eol_dialog_text_prompt(char *output,
00262                                   eolUint bufferSize,
00263                                   eolUint lineWidth,  /*0 means no limit*/
00264                                   eolLine question,
00265                                   void * customData,
00266                                   eolWindowCallback onOk,
00267                                   eolWindowCallback onCancel)
00268 {
00269   eolRect trect;  /*text dimensions*/
00270   eolRect brect;  /*buffer dimentions*/
00271   eolUint ww,wh;  /*window dimensions*/
00272   eolUint bw,bh;  /*button dimensions*/
00273   eolUint sw,sh;  /*screen dimensions*/
00274   eolBool wordWrap = eolFalse;
00275   eolWindow *win = eol_window_new();
00276   eolComponent *comp = NULL;
00277   if (!win)
00278   {
00279     eol_logger_message(
00280       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00281       "eol_dialog:failed to make test prompt dialog.\n");
00282     return NULL;
00283   }
00284   
00285   if (lineWidth == 0)
00286     wordWrap = eolFalse;
00287   else
00288     wordWrap = eolTrue;
00289   
00290   strncpy(win->name,"gettext",EOLLINELEN);
00291   eol_graphics_get_size(&sw, &sh);
00292   eol_button_get_stock_size(&bw, &bh);
00293   trect = eol_font_get_bounds(question,3);
00294   brect = eol_font_get_bounds("W",3);
00295   brect.w *= bufferSize;
00296   if (MAX(trect.w,brect.w) > ((bw*2) + 6))
00297   {
00298     ww = MAX(trect.w,brect.w) + 10;
00299   }
00300   else
00301   {
00302     ww = (bw*2) + 16;
00303   }
00304   if (ww > sw - 20)ww = sw - 20;
00305   wh = trect.h + brect.h + bh + 30;
00306   eol_rect_copy(&win->rect,eol_rect((sw/2) - (ww/2),(sh/2) - (wh/2),ww,wh));
00307   win->canHasFocus = eolTrue;
00308   win->drawGeneric = eolTrue;
00309   win->update = eol_dialog_text_prompt_update;
00310   
00311   comp = eol_label_new(0,"text_prompt_title",eol_rectf(0.5,0.1,1,1),win->rect,eolTrue,
00312                        question,eolJustifyCenter,eolFalse,3,NULL,eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00313   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00314   
00315   comp = eol_button_stock_new(1,
00316                               "ok_button",
00317                               eol_rectf(0.25,0.7,1,1),
00318                               win->rect,
00319                               "OK",
00320                               SDLK_RETURN,
00321                               0,
00322                               eolTrue);
00323   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00324   
00325   comp = eol_button_stock_new(2,
00326                               "cancel_button",
00327                               eol_rectf(0.75,0.7,1,1),
00328                               win->rect,
00329                               "CANCEL",
00330                               SDLK_ESCAPE,
00331                               0,
00332                               eolTrue);
00333   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00334   
00335   comp = eol_entry_new(3,
00336                        "text_entry",
00337                        eol_rectf(0.05,0.25,0.9,0.25),
00338                        win->rect,
00339                        output,
00340                        bufferSize,
00341                        eolJustifyLeft,
00342                        wordWrap,
00343                        3,
00344                        "",
00345                        eolFalse,
00346                        eol_vec3d(1,1,1),
00347                        1,
00348                        eol_vec3d(0.2,0.2,0.2));
00349   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00350 
00351   win->customData = customData;
00352   eol_window_allocat_callbacks(win,2);
00353   if ((win->callbacks != NULL) && (win->callbackCount == 2))
00354   {
00355     win->callbacks[0] = onOk;
00356     win->callbacks[1] = onCancel;
00357   }
00358   return win;
00359 }
